name: Lampette
description: I made this game because I wanted to make a game without bugs anywhere. They said it wasn't possible. I didn't listen. You will find no bugs in this video game. Don't even try to look for bugs, because you won't even find them. I found a bug on the toilet paper this morning. It was so gross. It had pincers. You won't see those kinds of things when you play this video game.
